PACK.update.new.de-DE: <color:#96a7b2>Ein neues <color:#4bfb00>Update</color> für unser Texturepack ist jetzt verfügbar. Du kannst [blue]<click:run_command:'/loadpack'>hier</click></color> klicken, um es dir zu installieren oder einfach den Command [blue]<click:run_command:'/loadpack'>/loadpack</click></color> ausführen.</color>
PACK.update.new.en-US: <color:#96a7b2>A new <color:#4bfb00>update</color> for our texture pack is now available. You can click [blue]<click:run_command:'/loadpack'>here</click></color> to install it or simply run the command [blue]<click:run_command:'/loadpack'>/loadpack</click>.</color></color>

PACK.command.apply.en-US: <color:#96a7b2>The [blue]texture pack</color> has been <color:#4bfb00>successfully</color> downloaded and installed!</color>
